name: Project Necromancy
description:
WARNING: This game features toon violence and has some blood-related effects.

NOTE: This game is a fourth-year project by students from the Breda University of Applied Sciences. We've worked on this for about five months. It's also an early release and needs some work before it's up to proper quality. Expect bugs and placeholder menus!

In this game, players control the necromancer that can raise enemies they defeat. Fight your way through the level, upgrade your army and defeat the king!

CONTROLS: NECROMANCER

WASD - Move the necromancer around

SPACE - Attack

E - Raise Dead

CONTROLS: MINIONS

LMB / RMB - Order minions to a location

Q - Force Recall all minions to the player (this stops any commands they might be doing and
